title: Fighting Drag With Drag  | Kimberly Reicks
description:
Click here to join the member exclusive portion of my show: https://utm.io/ueSEl

Kimberly Reicks, an Iowa mom and activist, went viral after crashing a school board meeting and demanding answers about a drag performance hosted at the school, all while dressed like the drag performer.
